publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1173 Marlyn Glen: Congratulations for Most Improved Beach-That the Parliament congratulates the community of Montrose on their beach's entry amongst the Seaside Award Winning Beaches in 2004 and notes its further distinction to have been judged the most improved beach in Britain.
S2M-1173 Congratulations for Most Improved Beach (lodged on 15 April 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-1173 Congratulations for Most Improved Beach (lodged on 15 April 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1173 Congratulations for Most Improved Beach (lodged on 15 April 2004) Helen Eadie*
